BattleshipClient - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Executable class that actually runs the Battleship game on client machine.

The BattleshipClusterServer class contains the code that the servers run in the Battleship Game.

BattleshipCommand - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Wrapper for the data sent from a client to the master.
BattleshipCommand(int, int) - Constructor for class edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipCommand
Creates a Position based on the input row and column.
BattleshipCommandProcessor - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
BattleShipCommandProcessor is a GameCommand Processor for Battleship At a high level, it takes user input which the server has received aggregates it over a quarter of a second, and then produces a position representing where the users have collectively chosen to launch a projectile.(Selected Via Average)
BattleshipCommandProcessor() - Constructor for class edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipCommandProcessor
BattleshipCommandProcessor Constructor This launches the CommandUpdate thread and sets up the instance variables for the command processor
BattleshipDisplay - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Takes BattleshipSnapshots from the servers and renders them.
BattleshipDisplay(GUIScreen) - Constructor for class edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipDisplay
Starts the input GUIScreen and sets its title.
BattleshipGame - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Stores the data and provides the gameplay logic for a battleship game.

BattleshipSquare - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Extends lanterna's Button class, which is a convenient abstraction for each position in our Battleship grid.

BattleshipWindow - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
This class extends the Window compoenent of the Lanterna library to render the Battleship Game on the client side.
BattleshipWindow(UpdateableClient) - Constructor for class edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipWindow
Creates the window for the Battleship game, including a lanterna Table that represents the board, navigable buttons to fill the grid, and labels that display which ships remain.
BattleshipWindowAdapter - Class in edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame
Extends lanterna's WindowAdapter, which itself is an abstract class implementing the WindowListener interface.
BattleshipWindowAdapter() - Constructor for class edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipWindowAdapter
